name: 譚巽言
objective:
最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之 VLSI 設計，使用 MSI 與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI 之設計與測試技巧，各種 CALD 軟體工具介紹。
1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic
2.VLSI realizations of combination logic
3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.
4.Components of sequential systems
5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.
schedule:
Week 1     Review of Logic Design Fundamentals
Week 2-3   Introduction to Verilog
Week 4-6   Design Examples Discussion
Week 7-8   Introduction to Programmable Logic Devices
Week 9     Middle term examination
Week 10   State Machine Charts and Microprogramming
Week 11-12 Floating-Point Arithmetic
Week 13-14 Additional Topics in Verilog
Week 15    Designing with Field Programmable Gate Arrays
Week 16    Design of a RISC Microprocessor
Week 17    VLSI Realizations of Digital systems
Week 18    Final term examination
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam 100 points
Final Exam       100 points
Homework        100 points
----------------------------------
Final grade = Total / 3
materials:
References:
1. Charles Roth, Lizy Kurian John, and Byeong Kil Lee, Digital Systems Design Using Verilog, International Edition, 2016, Cengage Learning.
2. M. Morris Mano, Charles R. Kime, and Tom Martin, Logic and Computer Design Fundamentals, 5th Edition, 2016, Pearson Prentice Hall.
